alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Dawes; North Sioux; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 18 at 7:02PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Box Butte, Dawes and Sioux Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 601 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of Montrose to 11 miles southwest of Flahertys Corner. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chadron, Crawford, Hemingford, Harrison, Whitney Lake, Box Butte Campground, Red Cloud Campground, Agate Bed National Monument, Montrose, Box Butte Dam, Fort Robinson Campground, Chadron Campground, Flahertys Corner, Chadron Airport, Whitney, Marsland, Fort Robinson and Chadron St Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte; Dawes; North Sioux; South Sioux
